name: How Can You Be Proud? You're Bi!
name_original: How Can You Be Proud? You're Bi!
description:
Designed for Pride Jam 2018.

Made with help from Jess Zammit, another person who has experienced all the same stereotypes. Bi pride is finding people like her.

(It's also sort of about getting so goddamn sick of stereotypes, straight people, and gatekeeping queer communities that you decide to shoot yourself into space.)

Don't despair if you have trouble finding each scene. Finding community is hard and takes time, after all!
